::Magmatron/Cerberus::

    Magmatron recived the reply from Zardus. He awo=
ke Cerberus and sent him to the Alliance base. Magmatron told him to make s=
ure he wasn't detected by any one else.

    Cerberus on his way was wonder=
ing why they needed an alliance with these bots. They were plenty powerful =
by themselves, if only he were able to lead.
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, No=
vember 22, 2000 5:04 PM
  Subject: Re: Message to Zardus/Shuttle Arrives


=
  ::Repressor/Zardus::

  Repressor sighs, listening to the two as the shut=
tle flies into the 
  docking bay of the Iron Fist.

  "We're here," he say=
s to Zardus over the comm, where do you want us 
  to go?"
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Zardus smiles as he recieves Magmatron's transmiss=
ion, activating his 
  comm for a reply.

  "Your offer is very acceptable,=
" 'Lord' Zardus replies to 'Emperor' 
  Magmatron, "Very acceptable indeed.=
 I welcome this new alliance, 
  Empereror Magmatron. You may send Cerebrus=
, I will tell the defences 
  to let him through."

  He sets off toward th=
e Iron Fist, switching his comm-link to 
  Repressor's frequency.

  "Take =
her to Conference Room A, I shall be there shortly."

  The Alliance leader=
 enters the Iron Fist, walking off toward the 
  conference room.
  ~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Repressor stands up, the shuttle's hatch ope=
ning. The docking bay 
  closes, leaving the artificial light to fill the a=
rea.

  "Let's go," he says, "Zardus wants us in Conference Room A."


    =
    eGroups Sponsor
